lead_paragraph: Anders Lee scored the tiebreaking goal in the third period, Jaroslav Halak stopped 31 shots before leaving late in the third period and got his 200th career victory and the surging New York Islanders beat the Pittsburgh Penguins 2-1 Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Lee Helps Halak Get 200th Win; Islanders Beat Penguins 2-1
headline.main: Lee Helps Halak Get 200th Win; Islanders Beat Penguins 2-1

snippet: Anders Lee scored the tiebreaking goal in the third period, Jaroslav Halak stopped 31 shots before leaving late in the third period and got his 200th career victory and the surging New York Islanders beat the Pittsburgh Penguins 2-1 Tuesday night....
